item.title: ‘She has two financially stable children’: Does it make sense for my wealthy mother, a recent widow, to take out a $100,000 life-insurance policy?
item.description: “It was generous of our mom to offer.”

item.title: Manhattan penthouse belonging to the late Paul Newman is listed for $10 million
item.description: Legendary actor and director Paul Newman’s longtime Manhattan home has been put on the market for the first time in 40 years.

item.title: ‘Yellowstone’ creator Taylor Sheridan and his $600 million Texas ranch empire
item.description: It remains to be seen whether Sheridan will part ways with any of his ranch properties in the wake of “Yellowstone” ending.
